00049 using namespace Hypertable;
00050 using namespace DfsBroker;
00051 using namespace Serialization;

00056 void ConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &event) {
00057 
00058   if (event->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00059     ApplicationHandler *handler = 0;
00060     const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event->payload;
00061     size_t decode_remain = event->payload_len;
00062 
00063     //event->display()
00064 
00065     try {
00066       // sanity check command code
00067       if (event->header.command < 0
00068           || event->header.command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00069         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%llx)",
00070                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00071 
00072       switch (event->header.command) {
00073       case Protocol::COMMAND_OPEN:
00074         handler = new RequestHandlerOpen(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00075         break;
00076       case Protocol::COMMAND_CREATE:
00077         handler = new RequestHandlerCreate(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00078         break;
00079       case Protocol::COMMAND_CLOSE:
00080         handler = new RequestHandlerClose(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00081         break;
00082       case Protocol::COMMAND_READ:
00083         handler = new RequestHandlerRead(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00084         break;
00085       case Protocol::COMMAND_APPEND:
00086         handler = new RequestHandlerAppend(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00087         break;
00088       case Protocol::COMMAND_SEEK:
00089         handler = new RequestHandlerSeek(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00090         break;
00091       case Protocol::COMMAND_REMOVE:
00092         handler = new RequestHandlerRemove(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00093         break;
00094       case Protocol::COMMAND_LENGTH:
00095         handler = new RequestHandlerLength(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00096         break;
00097       case Protocol::COMMAND_PREAD:
00098         handler = new RequestHandlerPread(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00099         break;
00100       case Protocol::COMMAND_MKDIRS:
00101         handler = new RequestHandlerMkdirs(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00102         break;
00103       case Protocol::COMMAND_FLUSH:
00104         handler = new RequestHandlerFlush(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00105         break;
00106       case Protocol::COMMAND_RMDIR:
00107         handler = new RequestHandlerRmdir(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00108         break;
00109       case Protocol::COMMAND_READDIR:
00110         handler = new RequestHandlerReaddir(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00111         break;
00112       case Protocol::COMMAND_EXISTS:
00113         handler = new RequestHandlerExists(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00114         break;
00115       case Protocol::COMMAND_RENAME:
00116         handler = new RequestHandlerRename(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00117         break;
00118       case Protocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00119         handler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_broker_ptr.get(), event);
00120         break;
00121       case Protocol::COMMAND_SHUTDOWN: {
00122           uint16_t flags = 0;
00123           ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00124           if (event->payload_len >= 2)
00125             flags = Serialization::decode_i16(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00126           if ((flags & Protocol::SHUTDOWN_FLAG_IMMEDIATE) != 0)
00127             m_app_queue_ptr->shutdown();
00128           m_broker_ptr->shutdown(&cb);
00129           exit(0);
00130         }
00131         break;
00132       default:
00133         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%llx)",
00134                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00135       }
00136       m_app_queue_ptr->add(handler);
00137     }
00138     catch (Exception &e) {
00139       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00140       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00141       String errmsg = format("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00142       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errmsg);
00143     }
00144   }
00145   else if (event->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00146     HT_DEBUGF("%s : Closing all open handles from %s", event->to_str().c_str(),
00147               event->addr.format().c_str());
00148     OpenFileMap &ofmap = m_broker_ptr->get_open_file_map();
00149     ofmap.remove_all(event->addr);
00150   }
00151   else {
00152     HT_DEBUGF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00153   }
00154 
00155 }
